1 Thessalonians__05.1: But of the times and moments, brethren, you need not, that we should write to you;
1 Thessalonians__05.2: For yourselves know perfectly, that the day of the Lord shall so come, as a thief in the night.
1 Thessalonians__05.3: For when they shall say, peace and security; then shall sudden destruction come upon them, as the pains upon her that is with child, and they shall not escape.
1 Thessalonians__05.4: But you, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.
1 Thessalonians__05.5: For all you are the children of light, and children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.
1 Thessalonians__05.6: Therefore, let us not sleep, as others do; but let us watch, and be sober.
1 Thessalonians__05.7: For they that sleep, sleep in the night; and they that are drunk, are drunk in the night.
1 Thessalonians__05.8: But let us, who are of the day, be sober, having on the breastplate of faith and charity, and for a helmet the hope of salvation.
1 Thessalonians__05.9: For God hath not appointed us unto wrath, but unto the purchasing of salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ,
1 Thessalonians__05.10: Who died for us; that, whether we watch or sleep, we may live together with him.
1 Thessalonians__05.11: For which cause comfort one another; and edify one another, as you also do.
1 Thessalonians__05.12: And we beseech you, brethren, to know them who labour among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you:
1 Thessalonians__05.13: That you esteem them more abundantly in charity, for their work's sake. Have peace with them.
1 Thessalonians__05.14:
And we beseech you, brethren, rebuke<u>
                the unquiet
               </u>, comfort the feeble minded, support the weak, be patient towards all men.
1 Thessalonians__05.15: See that none render evil for evil to any man; but ever follow that which is good towards each other, and towards all men.
1 Thessalonians__05.18: In all things give thanks; for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you all.
1 Thessalonians__05.21: But prove all things; hold fast that which is good.
1 Thessalonians__05.22: From all appearance of evil refrain yourselves.
1 Thessalonians__05.23: And may the God of peace himself sanctify you in all things; that your whole spirit, and soul, and body, may be preserved blameless in the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
1 Thessalonians__05.24: He is faithful who hath called you, who also will do it.
1 Thessalonians__05.26: Salute all the brethren with a holy kiss.
1 Thessalonians__05.27: I charge you by the Lord, that this epistle be read to all the holy brethren.
1 Thessalonians__05.28: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.
